item.title: Run JupyterLab on OpenGPU Cluster with SLURM at UCI
item.description: As a graduate student in UCI’s IN4MATIX program, exploring the resources available on the Donald Bren School Computing Support page (wiki.ics.uci.edu) is truly fascinating. While most of the documentation is quite clear, I noticed that there is a lack of detailed guidance on utilizing the OpenGPU cluster.
